mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fc_chargeback_order where
(location_=#{location_} AND #{next_interact_time_} >= next_interact_time_) or (location_=#{location_} AND next_interact_time_ is null)

SELECT
FROM fc_chargeback_order_send WHERE chargeback_order_id_ = #{chargeback_order_id_} ORDER BY sent_time_ DESC LIMIT 1
